text.en: Through the blessings of Mañjughoṣa and Hevajra,
You became a treasury of oceanic Dharma and melodious speech,
text.en-trans: yang kyi yenlak chö tsul gyatsö dzö

text.en: A guru who is the source of an ocean-like intelligence—
To you I pray from the depths of my heart: grant your blessings!
text.en-trans: nying né solwa deb so jingyi lob
